actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to convey certain Oregon and California Railroad Grant Lands in Josephine County, Oregon to the Rogue Community College District, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands in Josephine County, Oregon, to the Rogue Community College District. Reserves mineral rights to the United States. Provides for reversion of such land to the United States if it is used for other than educational purposes.

titles.title: A bill to convey certain Oregon and California Railroad Grant Lands in Josephine County, Oregon to the Rogue Community College District, and for other purposes.
